There's no keygen in the .rar file - only a serial number in a text file.  I have the same problem after a week of it working well- it now requires activation when I try to use MyDVD...

RE: activation- attempting to activate online doesn't work, but if you first disconnect from the internet it will give you an option to activate offline.  Use this option and it will give you an product key.  Reconnect to the internet and go to http://activation.roxio.com/activateme/ click on next and enter the product key... it then gives you an activation key. This worked for me (I used the S/N included in the torrent)

Here's the info I used- 
Serial Number: 61-UTR65-98K8L-95HU7
Product Key (from the software:) 40965-12644-43862-94504-24646
Activation Key (from the web site): 2C3CL-KWX2F-7Q0T6-T9FYS-D98XV

Let me know if this works for you!
